name: UpdateDataAttribute
description:
Update a data attribute's value via the API.

Use this tool to update a data attribute's value on Intercom. Note that changing the data type via the API is not supported; it must be done through the UI.

parameters.name: data_attribute_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the data attribute to be updated.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Valid versions include: 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: attribute_description
parameters.description: The readable description for the attribute as seen in the UI. Provides context or additional information about the attribute.

value_schema.description: The readable description you see in the UI for the attribute.

parameters.name: list_attribute_options
parameters.description: An array of strings representing options for list attributes. Each option should be provided as a hash with `value` as the key and the data type must be `string`.

value_schema.description: To create list attributes. Provide a set of hashes with `value` as the key of the options you want to make. `data_type` must be `string`.

parameters.name: archive_attribute
parameters.description: Indicate if the attribute should be archived. `True` to archive, `False` to keep unarchived.

value_schema.description: Whether the attribute is to be archived or not.

parameters.name: allow_messenger_updates
parameters.description: Specify if the data attribute can be updated by the Messenger. Use 'true' to allow updates and 'false' to prevent them.

value_schema.description: Can this attribute be updated by the Messenger
